## 读书，不是非做不可的事，而是想要去做的事。

```{r setup, include=F}
library(plyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(formattable)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
```

```{r book_list, echo=F, message=F, warning=F, results = 'asis'}
output_col_names <- c(
    '书名',
    '作者',
    '买了',
    '读了',
    '读完了',
    '打个分'
)

book_list <- read_tsv(
    '../data/books/book-list.tsv',
    col_types = 'cccccDDDi')

book_table <- function(books) {
    which_year <- books[1, ]$purchasing_year
    which_year <- ifelse(is.na(which_year),
                         '忘了是哪年',
                         paste0(which_year, ' 年'))
    header_ <- paste0('<h2>', which_year,'</h2>')
    table_ <- books %>%
        mutate(
            purchasing_date_month_day = ifelse(
                is.na(purchasing_date),
                '',
                paste(month(purchasing_date), day(purchasing_date), sep = '-')
            )
        ) %>%
        arrange(desc(purchasing_date), author, book) %>%
        select(c('book', 'author', 'purchasing_date_month_day', 
                 'reading_start_date', 'reading_finish_date', 'stars')) %>%
        setNames(output_col_names) %>%
        kable("html", escape = F) %>%
        row_spec(0, align = 'right') %>%
        column_spec(2, width = '8em') %>%
        column_spec(3, width = '3.2em') %>%
        column_spec(4, width = '5.8em') %>%
        column_spec(5, width = '5.8em') %>%
        column_spec(6, width = '4em')
    footer_ <- '<br/>'
    
    tibble(table_ = paste0(header_, table_, footer_))
}

book_list %>%
    mutate(
        book = ifelse(is.na(blog_link),
                      book,
                      text_spec(book, link = blog_link)),
        stars = ifelse(is.na(stars),
                       '',
                       paste0(str_dup('★', stars),
                              str_dup('☆', 5-stars))),
        purchasing_year = year(purchasing_date)
    ) %>%
    ddply(.(purchasing_year), book_table) %>%
    arrange(desc(purchasing_year)) %>%
    select(table_) %>%
    unlist %>%
    cat
```
